Change the Font Size

The track text and free format text font size can be changed using either the Format Text context tab or the Rich Edit control.

Highlight the text you wish to change.

On the Format Text context tab, select Font Size and select from the list. or,

Right click to open the Rich Edit control. Select Font Size and select from the list.

Tip. You can also click the Grow Font or Shrink Font until the size you want is displayed in the Font Size box.

Back Forward
